mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT (pd_name) AS pd_name ,p.PD_NO , p.PD_BY_DFS_SALE, pt.PD_PRICE , PDPHOTO_LINK , pt.PD_PRICE - (pt.PD_PRICE * p.PD_BY_DFS_SALE/100) AS PD_SALE_PRICE,mct.MAIN_NO ,mct2.MID_CATE_NO FROM PRODUCTS_BY_DUTY_FREE_SHOP_TB p ,PRODUCTS_TB pt ,PRODUCTS_PHOTO_TB ppt,MAIN_CATEGORY_TB mct ,MIDDLE_CATEGORY_TB mct2 ,SUB_CATEGORY_TB sct WHERE p.PD_BY_DFS_SALE > 0 AND pt.SUB_NO = sct.SUB_NO AND sct.MID_CATE_NO = mct2.MID_CATE_NO AND mct2.MAIN_NO = mct.MAIN_NO AND p.PD_NO = pt.PD_NO AND p.pd_NO = ppt.PD_NO AND ppt.PHOTO_TYPE_NO =1 ORDER BY 3 DESC) WHERE rownum <= 10
